name: The Blazing Banner of Wrath (glowing)
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Once owned by the Warrior-King Sargones III, this banner still
contains some of his living essence, and such, when waved about,
can terrify all those who witness it.
